defaultAutoCreate

Constructor Detail

Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeField

Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeField(config)
    Create a new RangeField A range field is a widget used to edit ranges. It's a trigger field that has in the popup 2 Ext.form.TextField (or classes derived by a TextField) to allow the user to enter the from and the to end points of a range
    Parameters:
      Object config - Configuration options
      • fromConfig The config for the from object
      • toConfig The config for the from object
      • textCls The Class to use as from and to (for example Ext.form.TextField)
      • minListWidth The min width (in pixel) of the popup. Optional. Default 20
      • fieldSize The size of the field (in number of characters). Optional. Default 20
